title: AI-Powered Text-to-Video Platform
narration: Welcome to the presentation on our innovative AIpowered TexttoVideo platform. We are revolutionizing video creation for educators content creators and businesses. This platform allows users to transform text into engaging videos quickly and efficiently.

title: Business Model: Dual Approach
content:
SaaS Model (B2C & B2B)
Subscription or pay-per-video
Service Model (B2B Custom Videos)
High-margin, fully customized videos
narration: Our business model operates on two primary fronts. First a SaaS model targeting both individual consumers and businesses offering subscriptionbased or paypervideo options. Second a service model focused on B2B custom videos providing highmargin fully tailored AIgenerated content for businesses.

title: Target Consumers: Who We Serve
content:
Direct Consumers (B2C): Educators, YouTubers, trainers, influencers, online coaches.
Indirect Consumers (B2B): EdTech companies, marketing agencies, corporate L&D teams, content platforms.
narration: We cater to a wide range of consumers. Our direct consumers include educators YouTubers trainers influencers and online coaches seeking affordable video creation tools. Indirectly we serve EdTech companies marketing agencies corporate learning and development teams and content platforms needing bulk video creation services.

title: Value Proposition & Unique Selling Points
content:
AI-driven automation: Hours to minutes
Customization & Editing: Easily modify content
Cost-effective: Affordable video creation
Multi-language support: Global reach
image_desc: benefits of AI video. Type: infographic
narration: Our platform offers several key advantages. AIdriven automation drastically reduces video creation time. Users can easily customize and edit AIgenerated content. Our solution is more costeffective than hiring video editors and we offer multilanguage support to expand content reach globally.

title: Market Landscape & Competition
content:
Competing with Synthesia, Canva, InVideo.
Differentiating through editable AI slides and affordability.
Large market demand in education & content creation.
Market growth with AI video automation.
narration: We operate in a competitive landscape facing platforms like Synthesia Canva and InVideo. We differentiate ourselves through editable AIgenerated slides and affordability particularly for educators. The market demand in education and content creation is substantial with projected growth driven by the rise of AI video automation.

title: Revenue Model & Break-even Analysis
content:
**Revenue Streams**
SaaS (B2C): ₹100 per video or subscription plans.
B2B Services: ₹7,299–₹21,499 per month for enterprise clients.
**Key Costs**
Cloud processing & AI hosting (Variable Cost ~fifty percent)
Development & Operations (Fixed Cost ~thirty percent)
Marketing & Sales (twenty percent)
narration: Our revenue streams include SaaS subscriptions and paypervideo options for individual users and monthly fees for enterprise clients. Key costs include cloud processing and AI hosting development and operations and marketing and sales. We are targeting breakeven within twelve to eighteen months based on volume scaling and B2B partnerships.

title: Technology & Scalability
content:
Built in-house: AI model for script-to-video conversion.
Automated narration & customizable templates.
Third-party integrations: Cloud video rendering & AI voice synthesis.
narration: Our technology is built inhouse featuring an AI model for scripttovideo conversion automated narration and customizable video templates. We also integrate with thirdparty cloud video rendering and AI voice synthesis tools to enhance our platform's capabilities.

title: Future Plans: Enhancements
content:
Faster & cheaper AI rendering (beyond FFmpeg).
Multiple templates & styles.
Mobile-friendly editing interface.
narration: Our future plans include developing faster and cheaper AI rendering capabilities expanding our library of templates and styles to match modern design standards and creating a mobilefriendly editing interface for onthego video creation.

title: Customer Acquisition & Retention
content:
**Acquisition Channels**
Organic growth via social media, YouTube, & educational partnerships.
Direct outreach to EdTech & corporate training firms.
Referral programs & freemium model.
**Retention Strategies**
User-friendly customization.
AI-generated insights to improve video quality.
narration: We plan to acquire customers through organic growth on social media and YouTube direct outreach to EdTech and corporate training firms and referral programs. To retain customers we offer userfriendly customization options and AIgenerated insights to help them improve their video quality and efficiency.

title: Key Risks & Challenges
content:
Adoption risk: Hesitant to switch from traditional methods.
Tech infrastructure cost: High cloud computing expenses.
Competitive pressure: Replication of features.
narration: We face several key risks and challenges. There's the risk of user hesitation to switch from traditional video editing methods. High cloud computing expenses pose a challenge to our tech infrastructure costs. Additionally we face competitive pressure from larger players who may replicate our features.

title: Financial & Fundraising Plan
content:
Current Status: ₹0 revenue (pre-revenue).
Bootstrapped with ₹2 lakh from founders.
Funding Requirements: ₹fifty lakh – ₹one crore.
Seeking angel investors or accelerator funding.
narration: Currently we are in a prerevenue stage bootstrapped with two lakh rupees from the founders. We are seeking fifty lakh to one crore rupees in funding to support AI development marketing and scaling efforts. We are actively seeking angel investors or accelerator funding to achieve our goals.

title: Why Invest?
content:
AI video automation is a growing market.
Strong early interest & scalable business model.
Focused on education & content creation.
narration: Investing in our platform offers several compelling reasons. AI video automation is a rapidly growing market. We have demonstrated strong early interest and possess a scalable business model. Our focus on the education and content creation sectors which are in high demand positions us for success.

title: Conclusion: Revolutionizing Video Creation
content: AI-driven automation for customization, affordability, and accessibility.
narration: In conclusion we aim to revolutionize video content creation with AIdriven automation ensuring customization affordability and accessibility. With the right funding and market traction we can scale into a leading AI video solution for educators and businesses globally. Thank you.
